meanings.meaning: to lead a life of indulgence

vlive.korean: 어떻게 살고 있어요? How are you living? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 전생 체험하다가 죽음을 경험한 로켓펀치 연희 #아이돌 #리얼리티 ┃로켓펀치 [펀치타임

vlive.english: Are you two living happily together?

누구랑 살고 있어? - 저는, 저는... Who's your roommate? - Well... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 가치사쑤업쒀~♡

examples.korean: Nothing would tempt me to live here. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 무엇을 준다 해도 난 여기 살고 싶지 않겠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: They were living in the most deplorable conditions. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 대단히 개탄스러운 환경 속에서 살고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were living in the most deplorable conditions. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I don’t want to be stuck in an office all my life—I want to live! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 평생을 사무실에 처박혀 살고 싶지 않아. 난 사는 것같이 살고 싶다구! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I don’t want to be stuck in an office all my life—I want to live! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They lead a quiet life. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 조용히 살고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
